subsubsection ‚ÄπConvert a function to sharing or back‚Ä∫

abbreviation ‚Äπto_share ‚â° map_option (Share 1)‚Ä∫
abbreviation ‚Äπstrip_share ‚â° map_option share.val‚Ä∫

lemma share_orthogonal_homo_to_share[locale_witness]:
  ‚Äπshare_orthogonal_homo (to_share::'a::{sep_carrier, discrete_semigroup} option ‚áí 'a share option) (Collect mul_carrier)‚Ä∫
proof
  fix x y z a b c :: ‚Äπ'a option‚Ä∫
  fix xx yy aa bb cc :: ‚Äπ'a‚Ä∫
  fix a' a2 :: ‚Äπ'a share option‚Ä∫
  fix n :: rat
  show ‚Äπx ## y ‚üπ to_share (x * y) = to_share x * to_share y‚Ä∫ by (cases x; cases y; simp)
  show ‚Äπa ## b ‚ü∂ to_share a ## to_share b‚Ä∫ by simp
  show ‚Äπb ‚àà Collect mul_carrier ‚àß c ‚àà Collect mul_carrier ‚üπ
        to_share b ## a' ‚üπ
       (to_share b * a' = to_share c) = (‚àÉa. a' = to_share a ‚àß b * a = c ‚àß b ## a ‚àß a ‚àà Collect mul_carrier)‚Ä∫
    apply (cases a'; cases b; cases c; simp add: split_option_ex)
    subgoal for a'' by (cases a''; simp) .
  show ‚Äπ(1::'a option) ‚àà Collect mul_carrier‚Ä∫ by simp
  (* show ‚Äπinj to_share‚Ä∫
    by (rule, simp, metis option.inj_map_strong share.inject) *)
  show ‚Äπx ‚àà Collect mul_carrier ‚üπ mul_carrier (to_share x)‚Ä∫ by (cases x; simp)
  show ‚Äπb ‚àà Collect mul_carrier ‚àß c ‚àà Collect mul_carrier ‚üπ
        to_share b ## a2 ‚üπ 0 < n ‚àß n ‚â§ 1 ‚üπ
        (n ‚¶º to_share b * a2 = to_share c) = (‚àÉa'. a2 = (1 - n) ‚¶º to_share b * to_share a' ‚àß b * a' = c ‚àß b ## a' ‚àß a' ‚àà Collect mul_carrier)‚Ä∫
    apply (cases a2; cases b; cases c; simp add: share_option_def)
    apply (cases ‚Äπn < 1‚Ä∫; simp)
    apply (smt (verit, ccfv_SIG) diff_add_cancel diff_gt_0_iff_gt sep_cancel sep_disj_commuteI sep_disj_multD2 sep_disj_multI2 sep_disj_share sep_mult_commute times_share)
    by (metis join_strict_positivity sep_disj_distrib_left sep_disj_share zero_less_one)

  show ‚Äπb ‚àà Collect mul_carrier ‚àß c ‚àà Collect mul_carrier ‚üπ to_share b ## a2 ‚üπ 1 < n ‚üπ to_share b ‚â† 1 ‚üπ
        n ‚¶º to_share b * a2 ‚â† to_share c‚Ä∫
    by (cases a2; cases b; cases c; simp; case_tac a; simp)
  
qed


lemma to_share_kernel_is_1[locale_witness]:
  ‚Äπ 1 ‚àà D
‚üπ simple_homo_mul to_share D‚Ä∫
  by (simp add: simple_homo_mul_def)

lemma strip_share_Share[simp]:
  ‚Äπstrip_share (map_option (Share n) x) = x‚Ä∫
  by (cases x; simp)

lemma map_option_funcomp_1[simp]:
  ‚Äπmap_option f o 1 = 1‚Ä∫
  unfolding fun_eq_iff by simp

lemma strip_share_share_funcomp[simp]:
  ‚Äπstrip_share o map_option (Share n) = id‚Ä∫
  ‚Äπstrip_share o (map_option (Share n) o f) = f‚Ä∫
  by (simp add: fun_eq_iff)+

lemma strip_share_fun_mult:
 ‚Äπf ## g ‚üπ strip_share o (f * g) = (strip_share o f) ++ (strip_share o g)‚Ä∫
  unfolding fun_eq_iff times_fun map_add_def times_option_def
        times_share_def comp_def sep_disj_fun_def sep_disj_share_def sep_disj_option_def
  apply (clarsimp split: option.split share.split)
  subgoal premises prems for x
    by (insert prems(1)[THEN spec[where x=x]] prems(2,3,4), simp) .

lemma strip_share_share[simp]:
  ‚Äπ0 < n ‚üπ strip_share (share n x) = strip_share x‚Ä∫
  by (cases x; simp; case_tac a; simp)

lemma strip_share_fun_share[simp]:
  ‚Äπ0 < n ‚üπ strip_share o share n f = strip_share o f‚Ä∫
  unfolding fun_eq_iff share_fun_def by simp


interpretation to_share_homo_one: homo_one to_share
  by standard simp

lemma to_share_eq_1_iff[simp]:
  ‚Äπto_share x = 1 ‚ü∑ x = 1‚Ä∫ by simp

lemma to_share_funcomp_eq_1_iff[simp]:
  ‚Äπto_share o f = 1 ‚ü∑ f = 1‚Ä∫ by (simp add: fun_eq_iff)

lemma to_share_total_disjoint:
  ‚Äπg ## (to_share o h) ‚üπ
  to_share o f = g * (to_share o h) ‚üπ dom g ‚à© dom (to_share o h) = {}‚Ä∫
  unfolding fun_eq_iff times_fun times_share_def times_option_def
      sep_disj_fun_def sep_disj_option_def sep_disj_share_def
  apply auto
  subgoal premises prems for x y z
    using prems(1)[THEN spec[where x = x]]
          prems(2)[THEN spec[where x = x]]
          prems(3,4)
    by (cases y, simp)
  done

lemma map_option_funcomp_map_add:
  ‚Äπ(map_option f o (g ++ h)) = (map_option f o g) ++ (map_option f o h)‚Ä∫
  unfolding fun_eq_iff map_add_def by (clarsimp simp add: fun_eq_iff split: option.split)

(* lemma to_share_funcomp_map_add: (*deprecated*)
  ‚Äπto_share o (f ++ g) = (to_share o f) ++ (to_share o g)‚Ä∫
  unfolding fun_eq_iff map_add_def by (auto split: option.split) *)


lemma to_share_wand_homo:
  ‚Äπ a ## (to_share o b)
‚üπ a * (to_share o b) = to_share ‚àò y
‚ü∑ (‚àÉa'. a = to_share o a' ‚àß a' * b = y ‚àß a' ## b)‚Ä∫
  for a :: ‚Äπ'a ‚áí 'b::discrete_semigroup share option‚Ä∫
  unfolding times_fun fun_eq_iff sep_disj_fun_def all_conj_distrib[symmetric]
  apply (simp, subst choice_iff[symmetric])
  apply (rule; clarsimp)
  subgoal premises prems for x
    apply (insert prems[THEN spec[where x=x]])
    apply (cases ‚Äπb x‚Ä∫; cases ‚Äπa x‚Ä∫; cases ‚Äπy x‚Ä∫; simp)
    by (metis add_cancel_left_left less_numeral_extra(3) sep_disj_share share.collapse share.sel(1) times_share)
  subgoal premises prems for x
    apply (insert prems[THEN spec[where x=x]])
    by (cases ‚Äπb x‚Ä∫; cases ‚Äπa x‚Ä∫; cases ‚Äπy x‚Ä∫; clarsimp) .

lemma to_share_funcomp_sep_disj_I:
  ‚Äπa ## b ‚üπ (to_share o a) ## (to_share o b)‚Ä∫
  for a :: ‚Äπ'a ‚áí 'b::discrete_semigroup option‚Ä∫
  unfolding sep_disj_fun_def apply simp
   apply clarsimp subgoal premises prems for x
    apply (insert prems[THEN spec[where x=x]])
    by (cases ‚Äπa x‚Ä∫; cases ‚Äπb x‚Ä∫; simp) .

lemma pointwise_to_share_bij[simp]:
  ‚Äπto_share ‚àò x = to_share ‚àò y ‚ü∑ x = y‚Ä∫
  unfolding fun_eq_iff
  by (simp, metis strip_share_Share)


subsection ‚ÄπNon-sepable Semigroup‚Ä∫

(*TODO: rename this to discrete injector or other*)

datatype 'a discrete = discrete (dest: 'a)
hide_const (open) dest

lemma split_discrete_all: ‚ÄπAll P ‚ü∑ (‚àÄx. P (discrete x))‚Ä∫ by (metis discrete.exhaust)
lemma split_discrete_ex : ‚ÄπEx P ‚ü∑ (‚àÉx. P (discrete x))‚Ä∫ by (metis discrete.exhaust)
lemma split_discrete_meta_all: ‚ÄπPure.all P ‚â° (‚ãÄx. PROP P (discrete x))‚Ä∫
proof
  fix x
  assume ‚Äπ‚ãÄx. PROP P x‚Ä∫
  then show ‚ÄπPROP P (discrete x)‚Ä∫ .
next
  fix x :: ‚Äπ'a discrete‚Ä∫
  assume ‚Äπ(‚ãÄx. PROP P (discrete x))‚Ä∫
  note this[of ‚Äπdiscrete.dest x‚Ä∫, simplified]
  then show ‚ÄπPROP P x‚Ä∫ .
qed

lemma inj_discrete[simp]:
  ‚Äπinj discrete‚Ä∫
  unfolding inj_def by simp

instantiation discrete :: (type) discrete_semigroup begin
definition ‚Äπsep_disj_discrete (x :: 'a discrete) (y :: 'a discrete) = False‚Ä∫
definition share_discrete :: ‚Äπrat ‚áí 'a discrete ‚áí 'a discrete‚Ä∫
  where [simp]: ‚Äπshare_discrete _ x = x‚Ä∫
definition times_discrete :: ‚Äπ'a discrete ‚áí 'a discrete ‚áí 'a discrete‚Ä∫
  where [simp]: ‚Äπtimes_discrete x y = undefined‚Ä∫
instance by (standard; case_tac x; simp; case_tac y; simp add: sep_disj_discrete_def)
end

instantiation discrete :: (type) sep_carrier begin
definition mul_carrier_discrete :: ‚Äπ'a discrete ‚áí bool‚Ä∫
  where [simp]: ‚Äπmul_carrier_discrete = (Œª_. True)‚Ä∫
instance by (standard; simp)
end

instance discrete :: (type) sep_cancel by (standard; case_tac a; case_tac b; case_tac c; simp)

instance discrete :: (type) sep_disj_distrib by (standard; case_tac a; case_tac b; case_tac c; simp)

instance discrete :: (type) ab_semigroup_mult
  by (standard; case_tac a; case_tac b; simp)

instance discrete :: (type) strict_positive_sep_magma
  by (standard; case_tac a; case_tac b; simp)


lemma cancl_sep_orthogonal_monoid__map_option_discrete:
  ‚Äπ inj_on (map_option f) D
‚üπ None ‚àà D
‚üπ cancl_sep_orthogonal_monoid (map_option f) D‚Ä∫
  for f :: ‚Äπ'a discrete ‚áí 'b discrete‚Ä∫
  by (standard,
      (case_tac x; case_tac y; simp),
      (case_tac a; case_tac b; simp),
      (case_tac b; case_tac a; case_tac c; auto simp add: inj_on_def; force),
      simp)


subsection ‚ÄπAgreement‚Ä∫

datatype 'a agree = agree 'a

lemma agree_forall: ‚ÄπAll P ‚ü∑ (‚àÄx. P (agree x))‚Ä∫ by (metis agree.exhaust)
lemma agree_exists: ‚ÄπEx P  ‚ü∑ (‚àÉx. P (agree x))‚Ä∫ by (metis agree.exhaust)

instantiation agree :: (type) sep_magma begin
definition times_agree :: ‚Äπ'a agree ‚áí 'a agree ‚áí 'a agree‚Ä∫
  where [simp]: ‚Äπtimes_agree x y = x‚Ä∫
definition sep_disj_agree :: ‚Äπ'a agree ‚áí 'a agree ‚áí bool‚Ä∫
  where [simp]: ‚Äπsep_disj_agree x y ‚ü∑ x = y‚Ä∫

instance ..
end

instantiation agree :: (mul_carrier) mul_carrier begin

definition mul_carrier_agree :: ‚Äπ'a agree ‚áí bool‚Ä∫
  where ‚Äπmul_carrier_agree = pred_agree mul_carrier‚Ä∫

lemma mul_carrier_agree:
  ‚Äπmul_carrier (agree x) ‚ü∑ mul_carrier x‚Ä∫
  unfolding mul_carrier_agree_def
  by simp

instance ..
end

instance agree :: (sep_carrier) sep_carrier
  by (standard; simp)

instantiation agree :: (sep_carrier) share_nun_semimodule begin

definition share_agree :: ‚Äπrat ‚áí 'a agree ‚áí 'a agree‚Ä∫
  where [simp]: ‚Äπshare_agree _ x = x‚Ä∫

instance proof
  fix x y z :: ‚Äπ'a agree‚Ä∫
  fix n n' m :: rat
  show ‚Äπx ## y ‚üπ x * y = y * x‚Ä∫ by (case_tac x; case_tac y; simp)
  show ‚Äπx ## y ‚üπ x * y ## z ‚üπ x * y * z = x * (y * z)‚Ä∫ by (case_tac x; case_tac y; simp)
  show ‚Äπx ‚âº‚á©S‚á©L y ‚üπ y ‚âº‚á©S‚á©L x ‚üπ x = y‚Ä∫ unfolding join_sub_def by simp
  show ‚Äπx ## y * z ‚üπ y ## z ‚üπ x ## y‚Ä∫ by (case_tac x; case_tac y; case_tac z; simp)
  show ‚Äπx ## y * z ‚üπ y ## z ‚üπ x * y ## z‚Ä∫ by (case_tac x; case_tac y; case_tac z; simp)
  show ‚Äπ0 < n ‚üπ 0 < m ‚üπ share n (share m x) = share (n * m) x‚Ä∫ by (cases x; simp)
  show ‚Äπshare 1 x = x‚Ä∫ by (cases x; simp)
  show ‚Äπ0 < n ‚üπ 0 < m ‚üπ share n x * share m x = share (n + m) x‚Ä∫ by (cases x; simp)
  show ‚Äπ0 < n ‚üπ x ## y ‚üπ share n x * share n y = share n (x * y)‚Ä∫ by (cases x; simp)
  show ‚Äπ0 < n ‚àß n < 1 ‚üπ mul_carrier x ‚üπ share n x ‚âº‚á©S‚á©L x ‚à® share n x = x‚Ä∫ by (cases x; simp)
  show ‚Äπx ## y ‚üπ y ## x‚Ä∫ by (cases x; cases y; simp)
  show ‚Äπx * y ## z ‚üπ x ## y ‚üπ y ## z‚Ä∫ by (cases x; cases y; cases z; simp)
  show ‚Äπx * y ## z ‚üπ x ## y ‚üπ x ## y * z‚Ä∫ by (cases x; cases y; cases z; simp)
  show ‚Äπ0 < n ‚üπ share n x ## y = x ## y‚Ä∫ by (cases x; cases y; simp)
  show ‚Äπmul_carrier x ‚üπ x ## x‚Ä∫ by (cases x; simp)
  show ‚Äπ0 < n ‚üπ mul_carrier x ‚üπ mul_carrier (n ‚¶º x)‚Ä∫ by (cases x; simp)
qed
end

instance agree :: (type) sep_disj_distrib
  by (standard; case_tac a; case_tac b; case_tac c; simp)

instance agree :: (type) sep_cancel
  by (standard; case_tac a; case_tac c; case_tac b; simp)
